text:
Hi!

Am I supposed to be able to create a private blog with "CMS Professional"?
From <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/require-member-registration-to-access-private-content#set-up-membership-registration-for-your-blog|the docs> it seems to be a "CMS Enterprise" feature. But on my developer sandbox account I can see this:
I tested the "private" option in my sandbox but I only got to a default login page and could not log in. No link to a registration page or anything like that.

CMS sandbox accounts are CMS enterprise - with  just a handful of limitations to prevent malicious use of those accounts.

Thatâ€™s why you see the memberships functionality.
